PackageOracle.name: DA_TV_LINEUP_CHANNEL
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_TV_LINEUP_CHANNEL
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.23.544609000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,tv_lineup_product_id IN NUMBER
,programming_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,assigned_channel_num IN VARCHAR2
,local_access_channel_ind IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,tv_lineup_product_id IN NUMBER
,programming_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_tv_lineup_channel;

body.name: DA_TV_LINEUP_CHANNEL
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_TV_LINEUP_CHANNEL
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.23.554449000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,tv_lineup_product_id IN NUMBER
,programming_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,assigned_channel_num IN VARCHAR2
,local_access_channel_ind IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_tv_lineup_channel.add, parms=' || tv_lineup_product_id || '|' || programming_service_product_id || '|' || assigned_channel_num || '|' || local_access_channel_ind || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_tv_lineup_channel a
(
a.tv_lineup_product_id
,a.programming_service_product_id
,a.assigned_channel_num
,a.local_access_channel_ind
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.tv_lineup_product_id
,add.programming_service_product_id
,add.assigned_channel_num
,add.local_access_channel_ind
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_tv_lineup_channel.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,tv_lineup_product_id IN NUMBER
,programming_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_tv_lineup_channel.del, parms=' || tv_lineup_product_id || '|' || programming_service_product_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_tv_lineup_channel a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.tv_lineup_product_id = del.tv_lineup_product_id
AND a.programming_service_product_id = del.programming_service_product_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_tv_lineup_channel.del');

END del;

END da_tv_lineup_channel;
